
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#include<vector>
#define maxlen 100005
vector<long long> f(maxlen,1);
/* This function calculates (a^b)%MOD */
long long pow(int a, int b, int MOD)
{
    long long x=1,y=a;
    while(b > 0)
    {
        if(b%2 == 1)
        {
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>MOD) x%=MOD;
        }
        y = (y*y);
        if(y>MOD) y%=MOD;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}
 
long long InverseEuler(int n, int MOD)
{
    return pow(n,MOD-2,MOD);
}
 
long long C(int n, int r, int MOD)
{
    for (int i=2; i<=n;i++)
        f[i]= (f[i-1]*i) % MOD;
    return (f[n]*((InverseEuler(f[r], MOD) * InverseEuler(f[n-r], MOD)) % MOD)) % MOD;
}
 
int main()
{
    int n,r,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int p=1000000007;
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&r);
        printf("%lld\n",C(n,r,p));
    }
}
